"Disable temperature highlights" does not disable the ugly temperature colors. The engine emmisive is correct and looks good. Don't mistake that for what I'm talking about here. The flat colors you get when something heats up. Is there a way to disable them? 

They need to go altogether imo. And be replaced with proper emmisives. Okay this engine is really hot... So why did it get painted red? ... Why doesn't it look like actual heat like the engine bells?
